en: As the evening shift winds down, most officers have left. Only you and a handful of guards remain.
A burly guard approaches your station. Name's Viktor. I'm on night watch.
His eyes are tired, haunted. You're the new one, right? The one Russet keeps watching?
Just trying to do my job. Why does Russet watch me?
Is there something I should know?
He shrugs heavily. Russet watches everyone who asks questions. My [color=STEEL_BLUE]wife asked questions[/color] once.
She's not around to ask anymore.
He glances around, then lowers his voice. Just... be careful who you trust.
And who you [color=CRIMSON]condemn[/color]. Some of us remember every face we sent to processing.
A nervous potato approaches. Papers seem in order, but you notice the [color=CHARTREUSE]subtle leaf pin[/color] on their collar.
They slide their documents across. A tiny note is tucked inside: "[color=CHARTREUSE]Sasha sent me. Package for the network. Please.[/color]"
The new [color=DARK_ORANGE]RealityScan[/color] blinks ready at your station. One scan and it will detect forged elements in their papers.
Pretend the scanner malfunctioned and wave them through
Use the scanner as required - you can't risk exposure
Signal Viktor to look the other way, then let them pass
You tap the scanner, frown, tap it again. "Blasted thing's acting up. Go on through."
Relief floods their face. They mouth "[color=CHARTREUSE]Thank you[/color]" and hurry past.
You catch his eye and nod toward the operative. He looks at them, then at you.
He turns his back deliberately, studying the wall. "[color=STEEL_BLUE]Scanner's been glitchy all day.[/color]"
The operative slips through. Viktor says nothing, but you've shared a secret now.
You run the scan. The machine [color=RED]blares[/color]. "Forged documentation detected."
Horror dawns on their face. "[color=CRIMSON]You don't understand what you've done...[/color]"
He and other guards close in. The operative is dragged away, still staring at you.
Sasha catches you in the shadows. That operative was carrying [color=CHARTREUSE]copies of the manifests[/color] to our contacts outside.
Because of you, the truth will spread beyond Spud's borders. [color=CHARTREUSE]You've made a real difference.[/color]
Sasha's eyes widen. Viktor helped? I had a feeling about him. His wife was...
She trails off. We have more allies than I thought.
Sasha finds you, her expression cold. That operative had a family. Three sprouts at home.
I understand fear. But [color=CRIMSON]fear has consequences[/color]. They'll be processed by morning.
I hope your clean record is worth it.
Murphy slips into your quarters. Heard there was some excitement at your station tonight.
[color=CHARTREUSE]Good. We're in this together now.[/color] No turning back.
Murphy's face falls. I... I thought you were with us. What happened?
Tomorrow's shift will be different. The stakes have never been higher.
But for the first time, you feel like you're on the [color=CHARTREUSE]right side[/color]. Whatever that costs.
The operative's face haunts you. Their family will never know why they didn't come home.
[color=STEEL_BLUE]Because of you.[/color]
